co.janicek.core.http.HttpCookieCore

type
class
HTTP Cookie functions.

Static Variables

public COOKIE_KEY_VALUE_DELIMETER(inline,null) : String

public COOKIE_PAIR_DELIMETER_REGEX_PATTERN(inline,null) : String

Static Methods

public parseCookies( rawCookies : String ) : Hash<String>

parameters
rawCookies
returns
Hash table of cookies.
Parse raw cookie string into a hash table key=cookie-name value=cookie-value. Works for cookies with "; " or ", " delimeters.
